text: John Charles Baron (born 21 June 1959) is a British politician. He is the Member of Parliament (MP) for Basildon and Billericay since 2001. He is a member of the Conservative Party. He is a known critic of the European Union and a supporter of Brexit. ==References== ==Other websites== * John Baron MP official website * * Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Politicians from Surrey
title: John Baron (politician)
